name: Damiux Ferrer Dream
description: Eng: Damiux has dreamed of one of the greatest adventures of your life, avoiding obstacles, walking through abstract and labyrinthic stages and defeating the enemies with specific powers which should be gained during the long way. Esp: Damiux ha soñado con una de las mayores aventuras de su vida, evitando obstáculos, paseando por escenarios abstractos y laberínticos y derrotando a los enemigos con poderes específicos que deberán ser conseguidos durante el largo camino.
